page.title: 05TOURISM 2
page.content: Opposite the gardens can be found the{Adam Smith Theatre}which offers an evening's entertainment for all cultural tastes including a pantomime every Christmas. For those who wish to stay in Kirkcaldy for a few days there is a fine selection of{Hotels, Inns,}and {Restaurants}offering excellent occomodation and meals. As Fife is the home of golf and has more golf courses per head of population than anywhere else in the world we must not forget to mention {Balwearie Golf Course. With the places to see and the things to do,no visitor should find our area a boring place to visit. In fact it is a place not to be missed.
